lines.text: I don't like Bull Riders... They're little men with big egos. Besides, he's got one of them skinny butts like the rest of em'.
Honey, I judge a man more by the size of his heart then his rear... It's likely to do you more good.

[to bronc rider in bar]
What's your name?
[after Lane gets kicked in the groin by the bull]
He's fine. He ain't gonna be such a romantic buckaroo for a while but he'll be fine.
Awwww Tuff! You wet the bed!
That's what we need Tuff, a trademark.
I got one, it's hard, full of juice, and barely fits in my jeans.
It's my flask, Lane. Cody, want some OJ?

[about marriage]
... I guess it's like Bull Ridin'. You gotta stay on and try not to get bucked off.
Were a tradition. Last of the dyin' breed.
They say it's not when you get hurt bull ridin', it's how bad.
Naa, the bulls don't want nuthin' to do with ya. They just wanna buck you off and get on with there business. A'sides... people'll heard you a lot sooner.
